title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 61.1 - Terms and conditions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 61.1 - Terms and conditions

State Regulations

The following terms and conditions shall apply to the value
and payment of every merit award. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
61.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
